alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 2:14AM PST until March 01 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Inland Empire above 2000 feet. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers are possible near the foothills in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
